Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Thank you, Link. Truly.<sp:0:4:0>You have taught Tulin the most valuable
lesson of all.<sp:0:4:0>My husband is beside himself with joy and
relief. No one wanted Tulin to come into
his own more than him.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Teba and I shall watch over Tulin so that
he can lend himself to your quest.<sp:0:4:0>I will pray with full heart for your good
fortune and Princess Zelda's safety.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the children and adults all working
as one, I believe there's no hardship we
can't overcome.<sp:0:4:0>Our harmony is our strength.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you so much, Link. Now that the
blizzard has stopped, all shall be well in
our village once more.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Hello, Link. Tulin has matured a great
deal, thanks to your guidance.<sp:0:4:0>I, too, have been doing my part to
keep him safe and supported, as a
mother should.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Thank you for saving our village, Link.<sp:0:4:0>Were you seeking Kaneli? He is out at
the <clr:0000>Flight Range <clr:ffff>at the moment.<sp:0:4:0>When the blizzard struck, he volunteered
to ensure the <clr:0000>Flight Range <clr:ffff>was not
damaged by the relentless snows.<sp:0:4:0>Though the blizzard has subsided now,
he seems content to stay there.
Talk06:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>The <clr:0000>Flight Range<clr:ffff> is <clr:0000>beyond the flags<clr:ffff>
visible to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>As my husband, Teba, has assumed the
duties of our elder, Kaneli has offered to
devote himself to flight tutelage.
Talk07:
While he is away, I have made keeping
his house my responsibility.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Kaneli passed his duties as elder on to
my husband, Teba. He is content now to
advise rather than lead.<sp:0:4:0>Lately, he has been enjoying his new role
as a tutor at the <clr:0000>Flight Range<clr:ffff>.
Talk14:
<snd:TalkPositive>The <clr:0000>Flight Range<clr:ffff> is <clr:0000>beyond the flags<clr:ffff>
visible to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkPositive>Flight practice and combat training alone
do not make a full-fledged warrior.<sp:0:4:0>More than anything, I want Tulin to
understand that.
Talk15:
I believe he is there now, as he is on
most days.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>I am concerned for Tulin.<sp:0:4:0>He believes that he is fully-fledged, but
he has not yet grasped one of the most
fundamental lessons...<sp:0:4:0>One cannot accomplish great feats
without allies at one's side.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>I hope he realizes that soon.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All the other adults have left the village
to investigate the blizzard or to procure
a supply of food.<sp:0:4:0>I believe my husband and I are the only
ones still here.<sp:0:4:0>That said, Link, the children have taken
up the adults' responsibilities while they
are away.<sp:0:4:0>They have divided up the work between
cooking and running the shops, with each
of them doing their share.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>To see the children working so hard gives
me hope that we will weather this crisis
as we have before.
